name: Slider.Root

value.description: The current value of the slider.
value.description_zh: The current value of the slider.

onValueChange.description: A callback function called when the value state of the slider changes.
onValueChange.description_zh: A callback function called when the value state of the slider changes.

disabled.description: Whether or not the switch is disabled.
disabled.description_zh: Whether or not the switch is disabled.

max.description: The maximum value of the slider.
max.description_zh: The maximum value of the slider.

min.description: The minimum value of the slider.
min.description_zh: The minimum value of the slider.

step.description: The step value of the slider.
step.description_zh: The step value of the slider.

dir.description: The reading direction of the slider. If set to 'rtl', the slider will be reversed for both 'horizontal' and 'vertical' orientations.
dir.description_zh: The reading direction of the slider. If set to 'rtl', the slider will be reversed for both 'horizontal' and 'vertical' orientations.

asChild.description: Whether to use render delegation with this component or not.
asChild.description_zh: Whether to use render delegation with this component or not.

el.description: The underlying DOM element being rendered. You can bind to this to programatically interact with the element.
el.description_zh: The underlying DOM element being rendered. You can bind to this to programatically interact with the element.

description: The root slider component which contains the remaining slider components.

slots.name: ticks
slots.description: The tick builders to pass to the individual Slider.Tick components.
slots.description_zh: The tick builders to pass to the individual Slider.Tick components.

slots.name: thumbs
slots.description: The thumb builders to pass to the individual Slider.Thumb components.
slots.description_zh: The thumb builders to pass to the individual Slider.Thumb components.

slots.name: builder
slots.description: The builder attributes and actions to apply to the element if using the asChild prop with delegation.
slots.description_zh: The builder attributes and actions to apply to the element if using the asChild prop with delegation.
